title: torch.HalfTensor object has no attribute sub_
body_html:
Running the following code crashes with the following error:

import torch

t = torch.zeros(2, 2)
h = t.half()
h.sub_(h)

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "pytorch_bug.py", line 5, in <module>
    h.sub_(h)
AttributeError: 'torch.HalfTensor' object has no attribute 'sub_'
body_text:
Running the following code crashes with the following error:
import torch

t = torch.zeros(2, 2)
h = t.half()
h.sub_(h)

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "pytorch_bug.py", line 5, in <module>
    h.sub_(h)
AttributeError: 'torch.HalfTensor' object has no attribute 'sub_'
body:
Running the following code crashes with the following error:

```
import torch

t = torch.zeros(2, 2)
h = t.half()
h.sub_(h)
```

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "pytorch_bug.py", line 5, in <module>
    h.sub_(h)
AttributeError: 'torch.HalfTensor' object has no attribute 'sub_'
```
